tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Sarika solanki is an excellent and very conscientious practitioner. When he is operating he is totally focussed on what he is doing. I went for a routine checkup yesterday which on this occasion included a scale and polish. During the procedure he discovered a filling had come adrift which she refilled during my ‚Äúcheckup‚Äù session.she is definitely the finest dental surgeon I have been involved with during my many years of treatment.
her whole practice is top rate, including his ancillary staff who are charming and efficient. Highly recommended.

review: This doctor is absolutely phenomenal. ***** **** *** **** ******* **** ******* ** **** She made me feel so comfortable and less conscious and did a perfect job on my teeth. I got a root canal and retainers done and I will keep going back for regular teeth cleaning to her. 10/10 for how well she explains the procedure and care after. Her staff is also very polite and they care for you a lot. Highly recommend her.

review:
They demanded 8000 plus 3000 for wisdom tooth removal and that's too much.
One of my teeth is half broken but no pain or any other problem so she said she will do root canal treatment and then put a cap in a single day n will charge 10000 for that*** **** *** * ***** *****
Its very expensive think before you go there.
